name: Ladies Shoe
subtitle: Niche product website
description1: If users login then they can go to the dashboard and manage some tasks. Like he can see my orders, pay, add a review. Reviews are dynamic. After reviewing, the reviews will be added to the review section of the home page.
description2: Admin can make another user an admin, if he wants.
description3: There is an Admin panel. An admin can also manage some tasks. Like adding products, managing products, managing orders etc.
description4: If the user doesn't login, click the purchase button then he will go to the login page. And after login success he will go to the purchase page automatically.

name: World Travel
subtitle: Tourism related website
description1: Allowing users to create accounts, browse packages, book packages and manage all services that he booked. Users also delete services from his booking services.
description2: There are options for admin to add services and manage services.
description3: Users will be able to know about the services by visiting the about page and contact with manager or admin by visiting the contact us page.

name: Mother & Child General Hospital
subtitle: Healthcare related website
description1: This is a good looking and responsive website. On this website there are many services for patients.
description2: Users can register with an email-password or login with google or github.
description3: After successful login, users can take the visit. After doing everything, the user can log out if he wants.
description4: By visiting the contact us page, users can know all information about the services. There is a departments page and users can browse all departments.
